Builder
[Engine]

Collaboration diagram for Builder:

Detailed Description

QSOS-Engine's builder module.

This module provides all required tools to build a qsos evaluation sheet from splitted repository's qscore, qin and qtpl files

Author:
Hery Randriamanamihaga


Functions

def build
 Builds name-version's qsos evaluation document.

 Generate the qsos XML file corresponding to givent document object.
